Description: Read-only Status Name. Use Custom Name to modify.
Override for the Default Name. Should be short and descriptive.
Short form abbreviation for Custom Name. (e.g. HH or Unk) Create one for each Custom Name. This may be used for small format devices.
Controls the order for KPIs when group by status is used, KPI filter lists are viewed, or if KPIs are sorted by status.
Override for default Status icon. Select an icon from the status grid in the right panel.
Read-only default Status color (for Light Theme). Use Custom Light Theme Color to override.
Override for default Status color (for Light Theme). Enter as a Hex value or select a color from the status grid in the right panel.
Read-only default Status color (for Dark Theme). User Custom Dark Theme Color to override.
Override for default Status color (for Dark Theme). Enter as a Hex value or select a color from the status grid in the right panel.
Controls whether or not this Status is displayed to site users in the Status Filter dialogue. If FALSE, users will not be able to filter this status.
Controls whether or not KPIs with this status are displayed in the Group rollup bars. If FALSE, the KPIs will be shown, but not included in rollups.
Controls whether or not KPIs with this status are considered In Alert.
Read-only ordinal value for status, which can be used when overriding system status.
